Package org.apache.gravitino.job

package org.apache.gravitino.job
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.apache.gravitino
     
  • Class
    Description
    JobHandle
    JobHandle is an interface that is returned by the job submission, which provides methods to get the job name, job ID, job status, and to add listeners for jobs.
    JobHandle.Status
    The status of the job.
    JobTemplate
    JobTemplate is a class to define all the configuration parameters for a job.
    JobTemplate.BaseBuilder<B extends JobTemplate.BaseBuilder<B,P>,P extends JobTemplate>
    Builder class for constructing JobTemplate instances.
    JobTemplate.JobType
    JobType is an enum to define the type of the job.
    JobTemplateChange
    The interface for job template changes.
    JobTemplateChange.RenameJobTemplate
    A job template change to rename the job template.
    JobTemplateChange.ShellTemplateUpdate
    A job template update for shell templates.
    JobTemplateChange.ShellTemplateUpdate.Builder
    Builder class for constructing ShellTemplateUpdate instances.
    JobTemplateChange.SparkTemplateUpdate
    A job template update for spark templates.
    JobTemplateChange.SparkTemplateUpdate.Builder
    Builder class for constructing SparkTemplateUpdate instances.
    JobTemplateChange.TemplateUpdate
    Base class for template updates.
    JobTemplateChange.TemplateUpdate.BaseBuilder<B extends JobTemplateChange.TemplateUpdate.BaseBuilder<B,P>,P extends JobTemplateChange.TemplateUpdate>
    Base builder class for constructing TemplateUpdate instances.
    JobTemplateChange.UpdateJobTemplate
    A job template change to update the details of the job template.
    JobTemplateChange.UpdateJobTemplateComment
    A job template change to update the comment of the job template.
    ShellJobTemplate
    Represents a job template for executing shell scripts.
    ShellJobTemplate.Builder
    Builder for creating instances of ShellJobTemplate.
    SparkJobTemplate
    Represents a job template for executing Spark applications.
    SparkJobTemplate.Builder
    Builder for creating instances of SparkJobTemplate.
    SupportsJobs
    Interface for job management operations.
